mapper.select: select p.* from Sys_User u LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru on u.id= sru.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN Sys_Role r on sru.sys_user_id=r.id LEFT JOIN Sys_permission_role spr on spr.role_id=r.id LEFT JOIN Sys_permission p on p.id =spr.permission_id where u.id=#{userId}
SELECT id,name from sys_role where id=#{userId} ;
